content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Plate Factory at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (16.0, 71.0), furnace at position (16.0, 73.0) and inserter at position (16.5, 74.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (18.0, 71.0), furnace at position (18.0, 73.0) and inserter at position (18.5, 74.5) that puts iron plates into chest at position (20.5, 75.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (20.0, 71.0), furnace at position (20.0, 73.0) and inserter at position (19.5, 75.5) that takes iron plates from furnace and puts into chest at position (20.5, 75.5)
- Burner inserter at position (18.5, 75.5) and (19.5, 75.5) that move iron plates to chest at position (20.5, 75.5)
- Chest at position (20.5, 75.5)

#### Copper Plate Factory at position(-52.0, 77.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-52.0, 77.0), furnace at position (-52.0, 79.0) and inserter at position (-51.5, 80.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (-50.0, 77.0), furnace at position (-50.0, 79.0) and inserter at position (-49.5, 80.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (-48.0, 77.0), furnace at position (-48.0, 79.0) and inserter at position (-48.5, 81.5) that puts copper plates into chest at position (-47.5, 81.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-49.5, 81.5) and (-48.5, 81.5) that move copper plates to chest at position (-47.5, 81.5)
- Chest at position (-47.5, 81.5)

#### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of following entities
- Assembling machine at position (0.5, 0.5) 
- Inserter at position (-1.5, 0.5) that puts iron plates into assembling machine
- Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5) that puts copper plates into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS
- Errors when connecting entities that are already occupied
  - Make sure the target position for connection is not occupied by another entity before attempting to connect.
- Errors when placing entities that are not in inventory
  - Ensure that the entity you are trying to place is available in your inventory before attempting to place it.
- Errors when using undefined variables
  - Make sure to define all variables before using them in your code.
- Errors when getting entities that do not exist
  - Ensure that the entity you are trying to get exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
- Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
  - Ensure that all required sub-ingredients are available and can be crafted before attempting to craft an item.
- Errors when connecting transport belts directly from a chest
  - Use an inserter to take items from the chest and then connect the transport belt and inserter as the source entity.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
